text: Zaw Htay (, also known as Hmuu Zaw; died 23 May 2022) was a spokesman of the Myanmar government who was the director general of the State Counsellor's Office from April 2016 to February 2021. He was the presidential spokesman of the Myanmar Office of the President from April 2011 to April 2016 under President Thein Sein. ==References== Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:2022 deaths Category:Burmese people
title: Zaw Htay
